required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Epidemiological Characteristics and Prevention Methods of Blisters in Ultra-trail Runners
clinical_study.official_title: Caractéristiques épidémiologiques et méthodes de prévention Des Ampoules Chez Les Coureurs d'Ultra-trail

lead_sponsor.agency: Institut de Formation et de Recherche en Médecine de Montagne

clinical_study.source: Institut de Formation et de Recherche en Médecine de Montagne

brief_summary.textblock:
PRIMARY OBJECTIVE : To evaluate the methods of prevention of the appearance of blisters set up by the runners before and during an ultra-trail
SECONDARY OBJECTIVES :
To evaluate :
- The main locations of blisters.
- The severity of blisters
- The effectiveness of prevention methods To evaluate the incidence of blisters in an ultra-trail context.

detailed_description.textblock:
MAIN JUDGEMENT CRITERIA :
Prevention methods used before an ultra-trail via a self-questionnaire
SECONDARY JUDGING CRITERIA : Location of blisters, via a self-questionnaire Presence or not of blisters at the end of the ultra-trail or at the time of abandonment
STUDY SCHEME : Post-race questioning

primary_outcome.measure: Prevention methods used before an ultra-trail via a self-questionnaire
primary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 1 year
primary_outcome.description: Prevention methods used before an ultra-trail

secondary_outcome.measure: Location of blisters, via a self-questionnaire
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: Location of blisters on the feet

secondary_outcome.measure: Presence or not of blisters at the end of the ultra-trail or at the time of abandonment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 1 year
secondary_outcome.description: Presence or not of blisters at the end

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Ultra-trail participants with validated registration
Exclusion Criteria:
- Presence of blisters or other skin lesions on the feet before the race

overall_official.affiliation: Institut de Formation et de Recherche en Médecine de Montagne
